name: Circles Experiment based on George Nees
description: This artwork is inspierd by Georg Nees, one of the pioneers of computer art. The experiment explores the use of circles and grid.

name: Circles V2
description: This experiment builds upon the first by introducing a new kind of circle

name: Circles V3
description: The amount of lines increase with 5 lines for each circkle

name: Squares Experiment
description: This experiment investigates the use of squares in a grid layout, exploring different sizes and colors to create visually appealing designs.

name: Squares Experiment
description: This experiment investigates the use of squares in a grid layout, exploring different sizes and colors to create visually appealing designs.
